scripts.openapi-riskmanagement: rimraf src/app/risk-management/tools/openapi && wget http://localhost:61196/swagger/v1/swagger.json -d src/app/risk-management/tools/ && openapi-generator generate -i src/app/risk-management/tools/swagger.json -g typescript-angular -o src/app/risk-management/tools/openapi --additional-properties ngVersion=7.0.0
scripts.openapi-account-closure: rimraf src/app/account-closure/openapi && wget http://localhost:5000/swagger/v1/swagger.json -d src/app/account-closure/ && openapi-generator generate -i src/app/account-closure/swagger.json -g typescript-angular -o src/app/account-closure/openapi --additional-properties ngVersion=7.0.0

scripts.openapi-uipath: rimraf src/app/robotic-process/openapi &&  wget http://localhost:5000/swagger/v1/swagger.json -d src/app/robotic-process/ && openapi-generator generate -i src/app/robotic-process/swagger.json -g typescript-angular -o src/app/robotic-process/openapi --additional-properties ngVersion=7.0.0 --additional-properties modelPropertyNaming=original
